name: King BOXING Fighting 3D
description:
King BOXING Fighting 3D is a great entertainment for all action lovers with more perfect physics gaming and ultra realistic action. Great HD graphics make them as good as real games. This game is filled with a variety of different game modes and features.
Features:
• Ultimate action packed world Punch Boxers Fighting Game
• The Correct and Practical Punch Shipping Boxing
• Fight the mightiest warriors to become Champion Boxing
• Select and customize your in Punch style
